pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Rispack - Pack of shared libraries from Rispar## HandlerSet of libraries to make serverless development a breezy.### Routes - API Requests/Responses### Record - Background Jobs## ErrorsCommon errors raised by services.## DatabaseManage connection to RDS Cluster (or RDS Proxy) via Secret Manager.## AWSPack of utilities from AWS services.## SchemasBase Schema for entities, events and other data classes.## LoggerAWS Lambda Powertools logger## StoresBase Store class and decorators to work with transactions
